text: An la she ling yige biyu: You liang geren, qizhong yige shi yaba [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi, fan chengle ta de zhuren de leizhui, wulun pai ta qu nali, ta dou zuo bu hao; ling yige shi quan ren zhuchi gongdao bing zunxing zhengdao zhe [zhu][xinshi]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma?
